pkgmetadata.longdescription: Puzzlestream============Puzzlestream is an interactive analysis enviroment for Python, providing a fast and simple way from raw data to meaningful results and visualisations. By organising your code in modules, Puzzlestream gives you an instantaneous overview of your project's structure - however complicated it may be. Highly interactive graphical interfaces support you in gaining an intuition for your data, asking the right questions and finding the corresponding answers. Platform independence and easy installation allow a quick start on any system you like.More information and the documentation can be found at https://puzzlestream.org.
